DOC.brief_title: The Effects Information Video Anxiety Bariatric Surgery Knowledge Among Bariatric Surgery Candidates
DOC.detailed_description: Only study investigate anxiety level , bariatric surgery nutrition knowledge weight loss expectation prior bariatric surgery . No study publish preparation lecture prior bariatric surgery impact anxiety level patient ' knowledge . A good preparation process prior bariatric surgery may impact high success rate bariatric surgery . Our study interventional prospective study 200 bariatric surgery candidate Assuta Medical Center ( AMC ) . The first 100 patient assign control group later 100 patient assigned experimental group . All participant receive standard care , participant assign experimental group ask watch videotape lecture 30 minute 1-2 week prior surgery date . The videotaped lecture include information guideline bariatric surgery preparation . Topics include : type surgery , preparation hospitalization process surgery ( e.g . expect , personal equipment need , description surgery admission process , etc . ) , dietary guideline pre- post-surgery ( e.g . low carb diet 2-3 week prior surgery , post-surgery diet progression , technique eat drinking , recommend dietary supplement ) , recommendation tip long term surgery success ( e.g . definition weight loss expectation , physiological , nutritional life-style strategy long-term weight loss ) . All participant complete Bariatric surgery knowledge questionnaire The state-trait anxiety inventory ( STAI ) questionnaire bariatric committee pre-surgery clinic take place 1-10 day pre-surgery . In addition , 20 participant recruit pilot study validation Bariatric surgery knowledge questionnaire .
